page.title: 19CLUBS AND SPORT IN BLOFIELD
page.content: There are several sporting clubs and facilities in Blofield. This mostly takes place around the Margaret Harker hall off the old yarmouth road. The hall is used as a community centre where many groups meet, such as the over 60s club, a playgroup, the young wives and other similar groups. The hall is also used in the evenings for badminton and beside it there are various sporting facilities. There are four grass and one hard tennis court with a small pavilion used by the tennis club. The recreation ground is used for football, where local league games are held on Saturdays. On the site is also a Scout hut used by the local Sea scouts.
